original_text: And he slept and dreamed the second time: and, behold, seven ears of corn came up upon one stalk, rank and good.
korean_text: 다시 잠이 들어 꿈을 꾸니 한 줄기에 무성하고 충실한 일곱 이삭이 나오고

sentences.original_text: And he slept and dreamed the second time:
seven ears of corn came up upon one stalk,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 줄기에 이삭 일곱 개가 올라왔는데
